put

public ModuleTester<T> put(String name,
                           Object value)
Supplies a dependency to the module.

Parameters:
name - Dependency name.
value - Dependency value.
Returns:
This object for method chaining.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if any of the arguments is null.
IllegalArgumentException - if the dependency has incorrect name or value.
IllegalArgumentException - if the dependency is an internal dependency.
IllegalStateException - if the module is already on.
